alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Charles Regional Airport, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Heberts Marina, Sweet Lake and Holmwood. This includes Interstate 210 between mile markers 7 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
